name: Overheat
description: With a roar, flames burst from your body in a 30 foot circle, centered on you. Any creature in range must roll a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking 5d4 + MOVE fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The power of the move exhausts you, and your next attack is done at disadvantage. If your next attack requires a creature saving throw, they have advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
